title: Unique script font
content:
I've seen this font used on numerous designs over the last couple of years, but haven't been able to identify it. Does anyone here by chance know what it is?

Thank you!

Font: 

 Cezanne 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054009/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054009/http:/typophile.com/files/font_371.jpg) | 19.63 KB |
author: littlecrown

comments.content: Yes, that's it! Thank you so much! :)
